data.description: Basic tools of music theory and compositional forms. Explores development of music through general survey of musical styles. Practical application of concepts includes listening maps and simple composition projects. Includes performance opportunities in simulated real world settings.
data.title: BASIC CONCEPTS OF MUSIC THEORY

data.description: Offers a comprehensive approach to music. Students learn the basic tools of music theory, the basic compositional forms used in music, and a general survey of musical styles.
data.title: BASIC CONCEPTS OF MUSIC
